tasks.task: Take the meeting role of timer/grammarian/ah-counter, and get best award.担任时间官/语法官/哼哈官，并且获得最佳。
Give two prepared speeches in one month. 一个月内做两次备稿演讲。
Give two table-topic speeches in one month. 一个月内做两次桌面演讲。
Step up to a meeting role or position you’ve never done before.尝试到一个你以前从未做过的角色或职位。
Give a speech that’s longer than 10 minutes.做一个超过10分钟的演讲。
Give a sharing speech that’s longer than 20 minutes.做一个超过20分钟的分享。
Become a sharing master online.做一次线上分享。
Create a 5-7min. “pocket speech” you can use anytime, anywhere.创造一个可以随时随地进行的5-7分钟袖珍演讲。
Attend a regular meeting based on hero’s journey theme. 参与一次英雄之旅主题会议。
Get best Table Topic award in a regular meeting based on hero’s journey theme. 在英雄之旅主题会议中获得最佳桌面演讲。
Attend a speech marathon. 参加一次演讲马拉松会议。
Become a contestant in a speech contest.参加演讲比赛。
Attend one district level event.参加一个大区级别的活动。
